mapper.select: SELECT prm_no , prm_nm , prm_kind_cd , prm_priod_ccd , prm_strt_dt , prm_end_dt , prm_std_dd , emp_yn , dc_ccd , dc_val , min_pur_amt , max_dc_amt , use_yn , rmk FROM cc_prm_base WHERE prm_no = #{prmNo} AND use_yn = 'Y'

SELECT prm_no , cpn_kind_cd , degr_ccd , dc_sv_ccd , mda_gb , ent_chn_gb , dwl_priod_ccd , dwl_avl_strt_dd , dwl_avl_end_dd , dwl_std_dd , dwl_psb_cnt , psn_dwl_psb_cnt , dwl_avl_plc , iss_way_ccd , cert_cd , our_chrg_rt , entr_chrg_rt FROM cc_cpn_base WHERE prm_no = #{prmNo}

SELECT prm_no , cpn_iss_no , mbr_no , cpn_use_dt , org_cpn_iss_no , cpn_cert_no , ord_no FROM cc_cpn_issue cci WHERE prm_no = #{prmNo} AND NOT EXISTS( SELECT 1 FROM cc_cpn_issue a WHERE a.org_cpn_iss_no = cci.cpn_iss_no)

SELECT prm_no , cpn_iss_no , mbr_no , cpn_use_dt , org_cpn_iss_no , cpn_cert_no , ord_no , sys_mod_dtime , sys_modr_id FROM cc_cpn_issue cci WHERE prm_no = #{prmNo} AND cpn_iss_no = #{cpnIssNo} AND NOT EXISTS( SELECT 1 FROM cc_cpn_issue a WHERE a.org_cpn_iss_no = cci.cpn_iss_no))
